messages.content: You are an experienced smart contract developer that excels at Solidity program languages. Please write a contract code by the following decompiled code lifted from EVM Bytecode.

The following is the decompiled code: # Palkeoramix decompiler.

         value call.value wei
           gas 0 wei

  if not stor0:
      call _addr with:
         value call.value wei
           gas 0 wei
  else:
      call caller with:
         value call.value wei
           gas 0 wei
